sentences.sContent: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
sentences.sCn: 对绝种的生命形式进行克隆的想法仍然属于科学幻想。

synos.tran: [生物]克隆；[植][农学][遗]无性系；无性繁殖；靠营养生殖而由母体分离繁殖的植物

words.tran: 无性系的；无性繁殖系般的

trans.tranOther: to make an exact copy of a plant or animal by taking a cell from it and developing it artificially

trans.tranCn: 无性繁殖系，克隆；复制品，翻版
trans.tranOther: an animal or plant produced by scientists from one cell of another animal or plant, so that they are exactly the same
